About Us

Graduationg Project Team formed in Istanbul Kültür University led by our Advisor DOKTOR ÖĞRETİM ÜYESİ WISAM ELMASRY

Our Goal

To implement deep learning in sign language interpetation through a game to help bridge the communication gap between hearing and deaf communities. By leveraging ready deep learning models and datasets with our own trained RNN and fun game mechanics, we hope to make the process of learning ASL easier and more exciting for people.

Osama Atia

Hussam Asskar

Oussame ElKarchy
